content:
One dark night, a little girl named Lily was walking in the woods. She was scared because it was so dark. Suddenly, she heard a noise. It was a big, scary bear! Lily was so scared that she started to cry.
The bear said, "Don't be scared, little girl. I won't hurt you." Lily was still scared, but she stopped crying. The bear asked, "Do you want to be my friend?" Lily said, "Yes, I want to be your friend."
The bear and Lily walked together...

The bear eats honey. He likes honey a lot. He finds a big tree with honey in it. He climbs the tree and eats the honey. He is happy.
But the tree is not happy. The tree is angry. The tree does not like the bear eating its honey. The tree shakes its branches and makes a loud noise. The bear is scared. He falls from the tree and lands on the ground. He is hurt.
The bear cries. He wants his honey back. He looks at the tree. He sees a bee on the...

The bee was flying around looking for flowers. It saw a big, yellow flower and flew over to it. The bee landed on the flower and started to drink the sweet nectar. Suddenly, a little girl came running towards the flower. She wanted to pick it and take it home.
The bee got scared and flew away. The little girl picked the flower and took it home. She put it in a vase and admired it. But then, she accidentally knocked over the vase and the flower fell on the floor. The little girl tried to pick it...

Pick it up. It was a sunny day and Pick was feeling very happy. He was walking in the park when he saw a big, red ball. Pick was so excited and he ran over to it. He picked it up and started to play with it.
Suddenly, Pick heard a voice. It was a little girl. She said, "That's my ball! Give it back!" Pick was a bit scared, but he was also very polite. He said, "I'm sorry. Here you go." He handed the ball back to the little girl.
The little girl...
